content.title: Configuring Update Operation
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, select IF Recipients.opstatus is equal to 0.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Widget section, select Set Widget Property.
  3. From the right pane, expand Desktop Forms > frmEditRecipient > flxEditRecipient and select flexSuccess.
  4. In the last pane, modify the following fields:
    • Property: Visible
    • Visibility: True
  5. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Function section, select Add Snippet.
  6. In the right pane, type the following code:
    self.view.forceLayout();
  7. Click Save.
